author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Allow card explorer to sort by version added

comments.body: use the # field in the card pool to show the version number the card was added. Clicking on the column header would then sort by version number.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
I think this would be a very useful function to easily view new cards which have been recently added. I knocked up some test code that uses the "date created" attribute of the script file which only works to a limited degree because the created date is not very reliable. But the actual sorting via # column works fine. 

If, as mentioned, we could use the version the card was added then it will be a simple case of updating the code from "date created" to "version". How to associate a card script file with a version is the hard part - the only way I can think of is pre-processing the script files during the CI build process which would add the current build version as a new property to the script file if it is missing. This can then be read as normal into MagicCardDefinition during startup.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: I guess you could also add a "download" property that could be set after downloading an image which would probably be easier but less consistent. This could be a date or the version of Magarena doing the downloading.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: A list of all cards added per version is in the ReadMe - Could just run through those cards instead of using a date/time
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body: Is the New option in the explorer Status filter good enough to close this issue?
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
I will assume that the New status filter will suffice. For players who only update using the monthly release it will show all the cards added in that month which is what the OP was after.

**Status:** Fixed
